Articles.Content: Dammit still processing
It will take an hour or so,, just posted the link before I call it a night:)
dude you should seriously put this into kerbal city man

Still very new with texturing, but I have at least learned to do some AO baking and such. Not sure if my parts or skills could be of use, but I'd be glad to help. Also be warned that the latest release of my mod isn't really the quality I'm currently going for. I expect to have a 95% updated version within the week.

Examples of my newer work at the beginning. Current release parts shown farther along.

Almost!! =)

Last of the 3 is going through its final tweeks. Then its just a last check on balancing and a release will be posted. Its safe to assume the ETA is "soon" =P.

These are some very advanced craft, and the entire team is making sure they operate as close to perfect as possible.

-Quote: Gollum.
Any ETA for the jetpacks?
Doing bug fixed on some of the custom code before we release anything otherwise we will just have a thread flooded with posts about the known bugs.

The first thing I will do when the release is released is to take a kerbal on a plane,while flying make the kerbal take the jetpack with the wing and drop from the plane.

I will try to land safely but that's not required.

The wing pack will have landing gear by the time it gets released (hopefully) so vertical landings won't be possible anymore. Right now the velocity curve is tweaked so its possible to take off and land vertically but that will be changes once the wheels are installed
Well, I am willing to unleash my creativity as a programmer, give me a task, and i will (try to) do it.
That took a while. I'll PM you shortly We also use a group chat in skype for 99% of everything, development or non dev related.
